headline: Shopify Beats Across the Board: Q3 Shows Growth, Efficiency, Brand Wins
summary: Internet, Everywhere--(Newsfile Corp. - November 4, 2025) - Shopify Inc. (NASDAQ, TSX: SHOP) announced today financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025. Shopify achieved 32% revenue growth and 18% free cash flow margin, marking nine consecutive quarters of double-digit free cash flow margins. Harley Finkelstein, President of Shopify said, "We build. We ship. We grow. That's the model - and it's running at full speed. From entrepreneurs making their very first sale on Shopify...

headline: How Investors May Respond To Shopify (SHOP) Teaming Up With Estee Lauder for Luxury Omnichannel Tech
summary: The Estee Lauder Companies announced in October 2025 that it has formed a partnership with Shopify to upgrade its digital technology infrastructure and deliver unified omnichannel consumer experiences for its portfolio of luxury beauty brands. This collaboration is a first of its kind in luxury beauty, aiming to accelerate direct-to-consumer innovation by integrating data and emerging technologies across both online and physical retail channels. We'll examine how this new alliance with The...

headline: ValuEngine Weekly Market Summary And Commentary
summary: US large-cap ETFs beat small-cap ETFs by a wider margin in Oct, though the latter still finished the month positive. Tech and growth ETFs once again outperformed value and defensive sectors.
